entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 08 January 2023
